description: T(n,5), array T as in A051168; a count of Lyndon words; aperiodic necklaces with 5 black beads and n-5 white beads.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Lyndon words
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1,1,-4,6,-4,1).
formula: G.f.: -x^6*(x^2-x+1) / ((x-1)^5*(x^4+x^3+x^2+x+1)). - _Colin Barker_, Jun 05 2013a(n) = floor(C(n,5)/n). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 05 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
